alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:44PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of thunderstorms producing mainly very heavy rain will affect southern Prowers, Baca, southeastern Las Animas and southeastern Bent Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 639 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over far southeast Colorado, moving east at 20 mph. These storms will affect eastern Las Animas southeast Bent, southern Prowers and all of Baca counties. The primary threat will be locally heavy rain. HAZARD...Heavy rain is the primary concern. Some of the stronger storms will produce small hail and wind gusts to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Two Buttes Reservoir and Two Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
